title: Semiotic Approach to Science Curriculum Design and Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories and research methodologies in the field of science
context.additional_context: Cultivating practical scientific problem-solving skills through team-based projects in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Interpretation of hidden semantic structures in curricula and derivation of improvement points using semiotic analysis tools
Design of an innovative knowledge production system in scientific fields by reconstructing interdisciplinary boundaries
Development of an action plan to apply a PBL-based curriculum model to real-world tasks
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
